main event: Seven objects were observed near Perrin AFB, Texas, on 3 September 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 10 to 20 minutes.,The objects were described as having a silver and bright orange to amber color.,The objects had a pulsating gaseous appearance and maneuvered in the sky.,The objects were moving from north to northwest at an elevation of 20 degrees.,The objects disappeared suddenly, similar to a light going out.
witness description: military observers including a control tower operator and instructors
